name: 6 French Horns - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 6 French Horns ensemble. Warm, noble tone with rich overtones. Versatile for both heroic themes, soft romantic passages, and powerful orchestral swells.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with legato - add an articulation change entry, switching to staccatissimo - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained/legato, then back to staccatissimo. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble French horns (6 players). CC1 controls dynamics for legato and sustained. Use velocity for staccatissimo.
